isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - Meritor Transfer Cases MTC-4208, -4210, and -4213 - Operation - Full-Torque Power Take-Off (PTO)

svcproc.title: Full-Torque Power Take-Off (PTO)

caution.para: Do not engage the full-torque power take-off (PTO) when the transfer case prop shafts are turning. Damage to the transfer case will result.

svcproc.para: Engage or disengage the PTO when the vehicle is stationary, the transmission is in Neutral, and the transfer case prop shafts are not turning. Do not load the driven auxiliary device when PTO is initially engaged. Use the transfer case in-cab switches to place the transfer case into Neutral.
You will know that engagement occurs by hearing it, noticing improved vehicle performance, or observing the optional indicator light in the cab.
